review: Love the fire stick I love watching everything on my tv it's well worth the price..
author: Cheryl

review: You can't watch newer movies. The discription also leads you to believe that Thousands of movies and tv shows are available, but it fails to tell you they cost extra. My child loves Paw Patrol, but that is not included in the membership. I dont see what is so great about this, it keeps skipping too.
author: Nancy McKnight

review: Acts "buggy" at times with random video errors. Remote is a little difficult. No on/off function.
author: ABM

review: Disconnected my cable, this is all I need. Use antenna for local.
author: Bags

review: What a wonderful way to kick cable to the curb. I am irritated at myself for waiting so long. I am extremely happy with this product and plan to purchase another one for the main living room TV in the very near future. Fire Stick and Amazon Prime rock!!!
author: Cheryl A. Davis

review: Having not explored the entire Fire Stick yet, for what I needed at the time, it was easy to setup and user
author: Amazon Customer
